name: MOVE ON (GunArcher)
description:
MOVE ON - Created for Mini Jam Color2 #111

Try to fulfill your happiness by avoiding your past memories.
Your good memories will be your greatest enemy when you want to move away from it.


How to play
Control by using mouse.


Credit  - Thank you for these wonderful assets.
Font - Atomic MD by Webfont
https://www.fontspace.com/a-atomic-md-font-f53535

Sky Shader - Kejiro
https://github.com/keijiro/UnitySkyboxShaders

BGM - Saurabh Chaudhary
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/lo-fi-chillout-music-for-games...

SFX - Dustyroom , Marcin Klosowski
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/ambient/sci-fi/universe-sounds-free-...

Minimal Webgl for Unity - Seansleblanc
https://seansleblanc.itch.io/better-minimal-webgl-template

I know this game still not good enough but I did my best.

Thank you for playing
